The bot ducks Savage's attack, sending Savage crashing into the 
ground. He hit with such force that the whole ground shook. He looked 
at the bot who just escaped him. He could tell he was weak. Except he 
was weak too. He would need rest soon, to make battle scars. But he 
wanted ths bot dead. He would fall. Behind the bot was a huge rock 
with a giant spike on it. Savage got up, shook his head, and started 
beating his wings, making such winds that it would drive the bot 
backwords into the spike.
